sn36.31:1.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, samisa piti, atthi niramisa piti, atthi niramisa niramisatara piti;
sn36.31:1.2: atthi samisam sukham, atthi niramisam sukham, atthi niramisa niramisataram sukham;
sn36.31:1.3: atthi samisa upekkha, atthi niramisa upekkha, atthi niramisa niramisatara upekkha;
sn36.31:1.4: atthi samiso vimokkho, atthi niramiso vimokkho, atthi niramisa niramisataro vimokkho.
sn36.31:1.8: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya …pe…
sn36.31:1.9: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn36.31:1.11: Ya kho, bhikkhave, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati piti, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, samisa piti.
sn36.31:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.31:2.3: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.31:3.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, niramisa niramisatara piti?
sn36.31:3.2: Ya kho, bhikkhave, khinasavassa bhikkhuno raga cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato, dosa cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato, moha cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato uppajjati piti, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, niramisa niramisatara piti.
sn36.31:4.4: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya …pe…
sn36.31:4.5: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn36.31:4.7: Yam kho, bhikkhave, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, idam vuccati, bhikkhave, samisam sukham.
sn36.31:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.31:5.3: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.31:5.4: Pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.31:6.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, khinasavassa bhikkhuno raga cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato, dosa cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato, moha cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato uppajjati sukham somanassam, idam vuccati, bhikkhave, niramisa niramisataram sukham.
sn36.31:7.4: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya …pe…
sn36.31:7.5: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn36.31:7.7: Ya kho, bhikkhave, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati upekkha, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, samisa upekkha.
sn36.31:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana, dukkhassa ca pahana, pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama, adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.31:9.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, niramisa niramisatara upekkha?
sn36.31:9.2: Ya kho, bhikkhave, khinasavassa bhikkhuno raga cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato, dosa cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato, moha cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato uppajjati upekkha, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, niramisa niramisatara upekkha.
sn36.31:12.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, niramisa niramisataro vimokkho?
sn36.31:12.2: Yo kho, bhikkhave, khinasavassa bhikkhuno raga cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato, dosa cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato, moha cittam vimuttam paccavekkhato uppajjati vimokkho, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, niramisa niramisataro vimokkho”ti.
